noOrdersText: No orders available for the driver.

cargo_transport_requirements: With each passing day, the requirements for cargo transportation become more complex, and the competition in the market is steadily increasing. In this context, it is important to have a reliable partner who will ensure efficient and safe transportation of your goods. Our company is a high-tech and professional leader in the field of cargo transportation. We offer comprehensive logistics solutions aimed at meeting the needs of modern businesses. Our team of qualified professionals is ready to take responsibility for all stages of transportation – from route planning to delivery to the destination.
register_and_login: Register and log in to the system
choose_truck_description: Choosing a truck should be based on the characteristics of the cargo, its weight, and dimensions. Also, factor in the necessary time for loading, unloading, and transportation. TransitLine offers 4 types of trucks:
flatbed_truck_description: This is a truck with a closed cabin and an open body with four sides. It is used for transporting cargo without special requirements for transportation with a total weight of up to 1500 kg.
all_metal_van_description: This is fast delivery in the city. Usually, it is a vehicle with an all-metal body for transporting goods, separated from the cabin by a partition. It can carry from 500 kg of cargo to 1500 kg and can transport any goods, even perishable ones.
tilt_truck_description: This is a truck with a canvas-covered body. A very popular type because loading and unloading can be done from different sides, which is convenient.
box_van_description: Used for transporting large loads weighing up to 1500 kg. The box allows you to protect the cargo from external factors.
